phrases: Deadly Queen... is what I have named it.
I am going to eliminate you now,
so I can sleep soundly again tonight.
I warned you not to move!
Not only that, but crushing three or four did no damage, either.
I will cut that something-or-other artery in your neck!
It is the one called the carotid!
I am going to cut it!
And it looks like your Stand
is the type that has power, but cannot go very far.
Looks like its range is about one to two meters, right?
If you want to die, go ahead and try to move.
So individual users have their own unique powers?
By the way, my Deadly Queen also has a special power...
What were you planning to do with this?
Well, I thought I would show you my Deadly Queen's special power,
seeing as how you are already as good as done for.
is that it can turn anything it touches into a bomb.
Now I can relax and sleep well tonight.
Episode 22 Yoshikage Kira Just Wants to Live Quietly, Part 2
Did you know there is a salon that will grant you love?
I hear it worked for someone in the high school!
Looks like one blast did not kill him...
My Deadly Queen can turn anything it touches into a bomb.
I turned this 100-yen coin into a bomb.
I can push the switch whenever I want,
and my opponent is blown to bits from the inside out.
half of your face blew into your head,
and about a third of your brain got mixed in with the flesh of your face.
Before I deal one more blow to you, I just remembered
there is something that I want to confirm with you.
You called this power a Stand.
That Josuke and Okuyasu also have Stand powers, do not they?
No, no, no, no, no, no, no.
No one is allowed to know the true identity of one Yoshikage Kira.
But you see, I would like to know about Stand users.
I am sure I would be able to find out
with some research, but I would like to ask you personally.
How many more are in this town?
I am certain you must know.
Listen, if you do not tell me...
I will eliminate your parents, too.
If you do, nothing will happen to them.
If you take too long, someone might show up here.
E-Everyone was saying they were looking for a murderer in this town!
You are still able to use your Stand?
I-I am... going to go to Josuke...
I am... going to protect Mama and Papa...
I am going to protect Mama and Papa from him!
cannot live in the same town as Mama and Papa!
No middle school students beyond this point Middle School Principal
You do not look so good.
He is from the middle school.
Th-There is something wrong with him.
You said everyone was looking for me?
Do you mean there is someone in this town
who knows about Reimi Sugimoto's murder?
But no one will be able to pursue me...
No one knows the identity of Yoshikage Kira.
As long as you are out of the picture...
I am going to protect my Mama and Papa...
Deadly Queen has already touched the doorknob.
He is been eliminated without a trace.
Did someone call my name just now?
Harvest was gushing blood when it disappeared.
That is not a normal way for a Stand to disappear!
Why did just one of them show up in front of us?
Let us go to the middle school.
Well, I guess I cannot help it now.
I hope my usual tailor has the same button...
Another soul killed by him is flying away...
There is no doubt about it.
Shigekiyo encountered him, and was killed by him.
Though I do not know why he encountered him,
I can tell it was him because he killed me.
I looked for Shigechi everywhere, but could not find him.
He disappeared within just five minutes
after Okuyasu and I separated from him.
Shigechi's books and school supplies were all left behind,
and his parents have requested a police search.
The culprit is a Stand user?
You guys probably do not know much about Shigechi,
but I cannot imagine there is anyone who can beat Shigechi's Harvest.
This guy killed Shigechi within five minutes,
and managed to hide his body somewhere within the school.
Jotaro, now that it is clear we are dealing with a Stand user,
we will have to help out, as well.
I heard you picked up a button.
One of the Harvests brought it to me.
It could be that Harvest ripped it off of the murderer's clothes and brought it to you.
Let me hold on to this button.
Y-You can locate the guy with the kind of button you could find anywhere?
We might be able to figure out the brand of the clothes and where it came from.
I-If we are done talking, I am going to go home.
I-I am kind of in a weird mood.
There is something wrong with Okuyasu.
Shigechi was a greedy, irritating little punk,
but he was the type you just could not leave alone.
We cannot believe he is gone.
Not to mention, he must feel annoyed because he cannot tell
if he should be angry or sad right now.
I am sure Okuyasu feels it far more.
It appears something awful has happened outside my notice.
I am going to warn all the customers who come to my restaurant.
I do not think he will come to my place, but just in case...
Stand users eventually attract other Stand users...
Though I never want to meet that guy.
So now everyone is going to take action, huh?
Last Friday was my birthday, right?
The guy I am seeing gave me this super lame ring as a present.
Why would I want this thing?
Though I still put on an act like, Oh, my gosh!
I was dating him because his dad owns some land,
but he is a total bumpkin.
This really is a kiddie ring.
I am going to go pawn it off for some money.
It does not compliment my beautiful fingers at all.
but her hands and face are beautiful...
If she comes to me, she can date me with a cleansed soul.
I am afraid we will have to part ways now.
Let us keep this farewell clean.
brought to you again today by your neighbor, Kai Harada.
How is the beginning of the new week treating you so far?
Already, there are only three days left in June.
That is right, it is vacation season.
I have got several errands to run today,
What plans do you all have?
so I would like you to stay home.
And now, the perfect song for this sunny day
Let us eat dinner together when I get back.
in the middle of the rainy season.
Thank goodness they still had the Parisian special.
Let us hurry up and go to Yohee Lake.
What is taking her so long?
It is been four days since Shigechi's incident...
Nothing has really happened since, but...
There is no doubt that there is a killer somewhere in this town.
yet anyone can also look completely innocent.
Um, did you find anything out since last time?
Like, about the murderer's button, or...
He does not really talk, so it is hard to have a conversation with him.
Rohan-sensei is scary because he is so overbearing, but Jotaro's silence is scary, too.
Is not there something we can talk about?
That is a very lovely coat!
This store appears to be a shoe store.
Yes, it is a shoe store.
It is a shoe store, but they also do things
on the side, like fixing waist measurements on skirts and hemming pants.
There is also an electronics shop that sells flowers.
I heard about all of the tailors around Morioh,
but I did not think to ask about places like this.
No, if you have not seen it before, do not worry about it.
I just could not remember what it was originally attached to.
Little boy, would you like an animal cracker?
I always eat the camel last, so you can have any of the others.
But not only have I seen that button before,
but look, I just finished repairing the suit it came off of.
asking me to put on the exact same button.
It is the exact same button.
M-More importantly, what did the customer look like?
What do you take me for?
I remember all of my customers' names.
That is how you are supposed to treat customers,
even if you have hundreds or thousands!
Could you tell us his name?
Anyway, the jacket has an order tag on it.
But I figure it might be faster to look.
Hey, I told you to look over here.
To think someone would actually investigate the button that fell off my jacket...
Why do things like this keep happening to me lately?
Who would have thought he would come to get his suit now?
But I will make them disappear
Do not run after it without thinking.
The way that jacket is being pulled is suspicious.
Episode 23 H eart A ttack, Part 1
